## Interactive map with leaflet
```{r, fig.cap="Clustered Marks"}
library(leaflet)

set.seed(123)

df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, max=-31.73, min=-31.82),
                 lng = runif(20, max=-60.40, min=-60.62))
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
